radiographic_examinations.findings: Visualized lung fields are within normal limits. No evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion. Normal liver, pancreas, spleen, and adrenal glands. The kidneys are normal with a round 2.2 x 1.9 cm hypodensity consistent with a renal cyst in the upper pole of the left kidney. Wall thickening of the sigmoid and distal descending colon with significant adjacent fat stranding, enhancing diverticulae, and a small amount of adjacent free fluid. Normal appendix and urinary bladder. No lymphadenopathy or worrisome osseous lesions.
